title: Why can't I use '&' in essays and other formal writing situations? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because it isn’t a word. Use words whenever possible in formal writing. Avoid contractions like “isn’t” and “don’t.” Don’t use “%”; write “percent.” Small numbers like “3” should be spelled out, like “three.” Why can't I use "&" in essays and other formal writing situations?
“&”’is not a word, but a symbol. From what I understand, it is too casual. Contractions and abbreviations are also too casual and not acceptable for any formal papers, essays, letters, and so forth.
